name: iStudy - Syllabus, Results & Timetable -BE/Diploma
description: Keeping up with the university is faster and easier than ever. Get rid of class and exam timetable pictures, Syllabus PDFs, previous year question paper copies, and searching thousands of websites to find results and notices. Make a profile and get all the important updates in one place. Faculty can select the subjects they are teaching and make class timetable according to subjects they are teaching.  Features on the iStudy app for Student & Faculty include:  * Personal class timetable * Exam timetable (Internal and Final) * Syllabus (for last two batches and updated) * Academic Calendar (Updated automatically once updated by the university) * University results * University notices relevant to you. * Previous year question papers (currently for some universities) * Option to change opening screen (switch between Syllabus, and Timetables) * Feedback and other options.  iStudy now covers complete details on GATE Exam. GATE Stats, Previous year question papers, the official answer keys, GATE Score Calculator. Importantly completely offline support.  Universities covered are * JNTUH Syllabus (B.Tech, B.Pharm, M.Pharm, MBA, MCA, B.Ed) * JNTUK Syllabus (B.Tech, B.Pharm, M.Pharm, MBA, MCA) * JNTUA Syllabus (B.Tech, B.Pharm, M.Pharm, MBA, MCA) * Anna University Syllabus (B.Tech, B.Pharm, M.Pharm, MBA, MCA) * VTU Syllabus (B.Tech, B.Pharm, M.Pharm, MBA, MCA) * AKTU/UPTU Syllabus (B.Tech, B.Pharm, M.Pharm, MBA, MCA) * TNDTE Tamil Nadu Diploma Syllabus * BTEUP Uttar Pradesh Diploma Syllabus * DTE Karnataka Diploma Syllabus etc.  We are coming up with additional features to take exams like GATE and have a discussion with other members.  Future updates will have many more features.
